page.title: 03Tourism at Reculver-cont'd
page.content: attractions. There are four quite large caravan parks most with showers and toilet facilities.To cater for all the campers there are a number of shops selling take-away food such as pie and chips and also a few shellfish stalls.There are a number of small shops selling food icecream newspaper etc.If you need clothes, shoes etc you need to go into Herne Bay , The nearest large town.Two of the caravan parks have their own clubs selling drinks, and there is also a pub called The Ethelbert.Other facilities include an amusement arcade, a kiddies korner, bingo, a betting shop and other mobile shops such as fish and chips.Quite a number of people visit with children because the beach is quite safe when the tide is out and there is plenty of room to spread out.
